reviewText:
If you are looking for information on the history of this beautiful, Beaux Art landmark in the middle of New York City, this video is the perfect resource. It features detailed historical information, from 19th century  railroad titan, Cornelius Vanderbilt's decision to build Grand Central, to  the in-fighting between the two architectural firms that created it.
This  video is made not only to satisfy history or railroad buffs; it is also  meant for anyone who is interested in New York City history and the  breath-taking building that forever transformed it.
